website_summaries.verdict: Multiple fairway wood lofts available in a model with a very forgiving club face for off-center strikes.
pros: High quality fairway wood design from a trusted manufacturer
Several options offered so you can find the perfect club to fit your golfing needs
Delivers an excellent distance performance versus other fairway woods with an aerodynamic design that produces high club head speeds
cons: All of the choices may be confusing for beginning-level golfers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing distance and accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this club was a game changer for me. I can hit it almost as far as my driver and with greater accuracy. It makes long par 4's reachable for me again. I let some of my golf buddies hit it and they were amazed. It is important to get the correct shaft for your swing, though. I got the 40 gram senior shaft and it is easy to hit and the ball explodes off of the clubface. But if you get the wrong shaft for your swing you won't see the same results, so I suggest you see a golf club fitter to make sure you get the right shaft for your swing brfore you place your order.
customer_reviews.author: JiminFla.

customer_reviews.title: As long as your wife doesn't see the price tag
customer_reviews.text: I usually like to test my clubs before I buy them but the local big name golf shop didn't have the shaft I wanted in stock. On top of that they wanted a $15 shipping charge and 10 day shipping time to get it to me. I took the chance on Amazon and won't be needing another 3 wood until I'm able to retire and play on a daily basis. My fairways are normally my most difficult club but after 2 practice rounds I am already hitting this club better than I ever hit my old woods. Callaway definitely got this Rogue set right for the average golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great quality used fairway wood
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a used Callaway Rogue fairway wood at reasonable price. Found this one that matched what I wanted but wasn't sure because they only had one in acceptable condition. When I received the club I was elated. It was in better condition than I ever expected. Would definitely use them again to buy used clubs.
customer_reviews.author: NCNole

customer_reviews.title: effortless club
customer_reviews.text: I switched from a titleist fairway driver and the first couple of rounds I found myself pulling it left, but what I found I was trying too hard. When I relaxed and let the club do the work it has become effortless - straight and long - and my go to club.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hit and good distance
customer_reviews.text: I also have a Callaway Big Bertha 4 hybrid with the jailbreak technology which appears to increase ball speed. My swing speed is a bit on the slow side so 7 wood is probably better for me than a 5 and definitely better than a 3 wood. I'm consistently hitting this Callaway Rogue 7 wood 175-180 which, again (and for a 56 year old) works for me and on longer par 4's. The club arrived quickly and really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hit with the distance and direction I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to hit and gets me more distance and better direction than my old Callaway fairway wood
customer_reviews.author: William Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great addition to my golf bag, jailbreak technology getting me some extra yardage
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this 3 metal, you won't be disappointed with the distance. Great club'
customer_reviews.author: Johnny P

customer_reviews.title: 4 wood Callaway Rogue
customer_reviews.text: I got this club and it is the perfect fit for the yardage I needed it for. Very happy with the condition, packaging and as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome 3 wood
customer_reviews.text: best three wood I've ever hit demo'd out in PHX and liked it then bought it and love it now two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN J KEPPEL

customer_reviews.title: Socko Three Wood
customer_reviews.text: 13 degree club face works as good as a driver. Nice shaft. Had to swap out the grip.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Kaiser Jr.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Replaced x2 hot. Hitting them more consistently with the new club
customer_reviews.author: AussieNU

customer_reviews.title: Best 3wood I’ve ever hot
customer_reviews.text: This 3 wood is fun to hit. Ball comes off the face hot and consistent.
customer_reviews.author: David Brett

customer_reviews.title: Integrity
customer_reviews.text: Simply said, I’d do it again and recommend Callaway preowned as a source for golf clubs.
customer_reviews.author: JTR

customer_reviews.title: Club was not in average condition
customer_reviews.text: I can understand, "popup marks" but this club looked like someone intentionally marred the top of the club with a grinder or some other tool. Was definitely not done from usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to play
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best clubs I ever had, nice and easy to hit.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Mata

customer_reviews.title: Nice fairway wood
customer_reviews.text: Clubs came out exactly as posted good condition a few minor scratches very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Understand the loft and your purpose for this club!
customer_reviews.text: The 3 plus is a great club, easier to hit off tee then from the fairway. But easier to control than my driver!!! Can’t wait to keep practicing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Truly a heaven wood
customer_reviews.text: Great wood from fairway and long 3s. Easy to hit up in the air.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hsia

customer_reviews.title: Great Club
customer_reviews.text: Was able to hit this club very well off the fairway and the ball just explodes off club face. Love it, quite an improvement over my old fairway wood.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette G. Nations

customer_reviews.title: Great Feel
customer_reviews.text: This club is awesome. Great feel, outstanding distance and forgiving if not hit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great distance and control! Im a single handicap player and highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Dave ko

customer_reviews.title: Fixed
customer_reviews.text: I broke before I could use it. Had to send it to Calloway to get fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good as new.
customer_reviews.text: Club looks like new. Great value. Came with head cover and tool.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R.

customer_reviews.title: Looks new
customer_reviews.text: The 3 wood looks brand new. Can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All OK so far
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, arrived on time. Didn't come with the weight adjusting tool, but I have one already for the driver. Played several times with it, this club rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: gained 40 yards
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I have never felt compelled to leave a review for any product before, but this club is far superior to any I have used in the past. I have hit it as far as 260 yards. My previous Callaway 3 wood was never over 220. I am a bogey golfer and this club is putting my pin high in 2 strokes on a par 5. Never in my life has this been the case. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Andrew Larriviere

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Head Cover
customer_reviews.text: This 5 wood was sent to my father in-law as a gift for fathers day. . He likes the club but received a 7 wood head cover instead of the 5 wood head cover he should have received. Any help would be appreciated?
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Worth the dough.
customer_reviews.text: I got to hit this today. I have to say it was just enjoyable. If I had the money I would purchase one right now. Thanks again to the nice gentleman at UW range for the opportunity to feel a very very balanced "buttery" swing. I'm still hyped. Buy the if you hate it sell it to me cheaper. Long and straight folks have a great walk.- Mike Clark
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Clark

product_meta.title: Callaway Golf 2018 Rogue Fairway Wood
product_meta.description: Rogue fairway woods are the first fairways with Jailbreak technology, and also incorporate our renowned Face Cup technology. Together, the two most effective speed-enhancing technologies we've ever developed make Rogue the most powerful fairways we've ever created.
feature_bullets: Easy to Launch on a Strong, Straight Flight
Triaxial Carbon Crown for Distance and Forgiveness
Industry-leading Selection of Shaft, Weight and Loft Options
